item.title: Fyle system from a mdk file
item.description: vmdk Filesystem Here is a mini guide on how to access the filesystem from a vmdk file using 7zip.This can be done in many ways, using vmware-mount, QENU, /dev/loop and guestmount or 7zip For this guide i used 7zip as I found it to be the easiest way.
